102.<center>神より与えられた この広い世界で|<center>我らは 姿の異: In this wide world given to us by God|We will join forces with others of different shapes and sizes|If we support each other and live together...I hope that your vows will be eternal|In this place, the center of the world|The sight of our beloved friends...

103.<center>『風の民 エルフ』|<center>自然を愛し 森と共に生きる|: "Elves of the Wind"|Love nature and live with the forest|It's a pretty little thing with little wings|on its back.They value tradition and formality|Learn the world's truths in depth|I've had the privilege of working with some|of the finest spellcasters in the world.

104.<center>『炎の民 オーガ』|<center>厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生き: Ogre of the Flame|Living strong in the harsh wilderness|A large body with antlers and a tail...They were belligerent and respected the strong|With outstanding strength and stamina|He risked his life for the weak, for his|friends...

105.<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』|<center>雄大な山々に恩恵を受け 大: "Dwarves of the Earth"|Living with the earth, benefiting from the majestic mountains|A small body with big ears...With their high technology and strong desires|With his dexterity and quickness, he was able to|We've built several advanced civilizations...

106.<center>『水の民 ウェディ』|<center>海に浮かぶ美しい島々で 自: "Wedi, the Water People"|Living Free on Beautiful Islands in the Sea|With a body the color of blue water...They don't like to be tied down, they love to sing and fall in love|We'll take advantage of our speed and strength|I'm only serious when I'm protecting someone|I love.

107.<center>『花の民 プクリポ』|<center>絵本のような色彩の町で 楽: Pucuripo, People of Flowers|Living for fun in a town of picture-book colors|Fluffy and adorable, with a small body...Born with strong magical powers and dexterity, they|More than fighting, more than creating things|I'm passionate about creating fun...

108.<center>『勇の民 人間』|<center>どんな地でも 生きていける|<: People of Valor, Humans|I can live in any place|Not too big, not too small...They were never supposed to excel|When faced with a crisis, never lose heart|I have the courage to face it...
